* Iron Raptor hissed once the sword burst into blue flames, seering the 
skin/armor around the wound...and healing it. Stopping all blood flow.
But she reared her head back from the flames as they reached for her head 
and exited her wound.
But with her own quick thinking she whipped around to the side and jabbed at 
FireBlade's side with her teeth there. While her tail circled around and 
whipped at his back, to send him INTO her waiting jaws.*
